name: Perfect Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Tried and true, these are the most perfect vegan chocolate chip cookies ever! Made in 1 bowl and oh-so-soft, chewy and full of chocolate chips!

video.name: Perfect Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
video.description: Tried and true, these are the most perfect vegan chocolate chip cookies ever! Made in 1 bowl and oh-so-soft, chewy and full of chocolate chips!

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (8 tablespoons) vegan butter, slightly softened to room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line two cookie sheets with parchment paper or lightly spray with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line two cookie sheets with parchment paper or lightly spray with oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the ground flaxseed and water in a small bowl and set aside to make your flax egg.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the ground flaxseed and water in a small bowl and set aside to make your flax egg.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl using a handheld mixer or a stand mixer with the paddle attachment, beat the softened vegan butter and brown sugar for 1-2 minutes until creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl using a handheld mixer or a stand mixer with the paddle attachment, beat the softened vegan butter and brown sugar for 1-2 minutes until creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vanilla and the flax egg and mix to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vanilla and the flax egg and mix to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Next, stop the mixer and add the flour. Sprinkle the cornstarch, baking soda and salt on top of the flour. Turn the mixer on low speed, and mix until just combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Next, stop the mixer and add the flour. Sprinkle the cornstarch, baking soda and salt on top of the flour. Turn the mixer on low speed, and mix until just combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chocolate chips to incorporate, either by hand or using the mixer.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chocolate chips to incorporate, either by hand or using the mixer.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll the dough into balls, about 1-2 tablespoons each. Place on the prepared pans and bake for 10 minutes (12 minutes for larger cookies), until they are barely golden around the edges. Do not over bake! They will be puffy and lightly colored.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll the dough into balls, about 1-2 tablespoons each. Place on the prepared pans and bake for 10 minutes (12 minutes for larger cookies), until they are barely golden around the edges. Do not over bake! They will be puffy and lightly colored.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool on the cookie sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer to a cooling rack. The cookies will firm up as they cool, and become the most perfect chewy cookies ever! Enjoy.
